root.name: join()
root.description: Combines an array of elements into one String.
root.syntax: join(anyArray, separator) join(intArray, separator, digits) join(floatArray, separator, left, right)

parameter.label: array
parameter.description: array of strings, ints, or floats

parameter.label: separator
parameter.description: String: a string to be placed between each item

parameter.label: digits
parameter.description: int: number of digits to pad with zeroes

parameter.label: left
parameter.description: int: number of digits to the left of the decimal point

parameter.label: right
parameter.description: int: number of digits to the right of the decimal point
